snippet: Sheik Mohammad Hussein, the grand mufti of Jerusalem, was released without charges after being asked about a disturbance between Israelis and Arabs at a holy site a day earlier.
abstract: Israeli police detain Palestinians’ top Muslim cleric Sheik Mohammad Hussein for questioning about disturbances at fiercely contested holy site in Jerusalem known to Jews as Temple Mount and to Muslims as Noble Sanctuary.
lead_paragraph: Sheik Mohammad Hussein, the grand mufti of Jerusalem, was released without charges after being asked about a disturbance between Israelis and Arabs at a holy site a day earlier.

headline.seo: Israeli Police Question Muslim Cleric After Scuffle
headline.main: Israeli Police Question Muslim Cleric After Scuffle
